Title: The Wanderer
Plot: Lagertha and Athelstan help to establish the Viking settlement in Wessex. Harbard, a mysterious wanderer, arrives in Kattegat, realizing the forewarned dreams of Aslaug, Siggy and Helga.
GuestStars: Kevin Durand, Amy Bailey, Moe Dunford, Maude Hirst, Gaia Weiss, Jefferson Hall, Jennie Jacques, John Kavanagh
